name: Dvorak Designs
tagline: Modx, WordPress Development and SEO Services.
description:
Dvorak Designs is a growing network of websites that are focused on various aspects of web design. The websites are owned and operated by Preston Dvorak.
The first website in their network is a Freelance Web Design service. This service is setup to encourage people and businesses who have never had a website, to get one created. This means they make every effort to explain the design process to their clients, and what exactly goes into the making of a website (without being too confusing).
